mapper.select: select order_no, pro_no, order_amount, order_date from tb_order where order_date between trunc(sysdate)-7 and trunc(sysdate)-1

select * from ( select p.pro_no, pro_name, pro_price, order_amount, (pro_price * order_amount) as revenue, order_date, pro_img_path from tb_product p left join tb_order o on (p.pro_no = o.pro_no) where order_date between trunc(sysdate)- 7 and trunc(sysdate) order by revenue desc ) where rownum <= 1
select order_amount, (pro_price * order_amount) as revenue, order_date from tb_product p left join tb_order o on (p.pro_no = o.pro_no) where trunc(order_date) = trunc(sysdate)
